author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tabcorp Holdings Posts HY Net Profit Of $24.6 Mln, Down 58 Percent
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Tabcorp Holdings Ltd:
* HY PROFIT FROM ORDINARY ACTIVITIES AFTER TAX ATTRIBUTABLE TO MEMBERS $24.6 MILLION DOWN 58 PERCENT
* HY REVENUE FROM ORDINARY ACTIVITIES $ ‍1,376.2​ MILLION, UP 19 PERCENT
* INTERIM DIVIDEND ‍11.0 CENTS PER SHARE​ * ‍FY18 DIVIDEND TARGET IS 90% OF NPAT BEFORE SIGNIFICANT ITEMS, AMORTISATION OF VICTORIAN WAGERING AND BETTING LICENCE AND SUN BETS​
* REVENUES FROM BUSINESSES FORMERLY RUN BY TATTS GROUP FOR THE 18 DAYS FROM 14 DEC TO 31 DEC WERE $176.3 MLN
* ‍SUN BETS BUSINESS REMAINS UNDER REVIEW​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
